channel.title: Velasquez Family Coffee =) - Excellent coffee directly from our family to you

item.title: Welcome to the Velasquez Family Coffee Website.
item.description:
Velasquez Family Coffee was started by Guillermo and Cathy Velasquez to sell the high quality coffee grown by our family and friends in the mountains of Honduras. This ensures them a livable income and supports their effort to protect and enhance the precious cloud forest ecosystem where they farm. Velasquez Family Coffee has been featured in the Minneapolis Star Tribune, The Twin Cities Daily Planet, and in The Brief, a publication of the University of Minnesota. We were honored to be one of 14 finalists in the Neighborhood Development Center's 2012 Annual Awards banquet. 

Download a copy of our beautiful new flyer or watch our amazing new video from the coffee farm to learn more.

read more
item.dc:creator: jim

item.title: What's New
item.description:
How to Buy Velasquez Family Coffee

1) Order through our secure Shopping Cart -- You can also email us through our web form or call us at 651-587-5356.

2) Free Monthly Delivery -- If you live or work in Saint Paul or Minneapolis (and some nearby suburbs) we can deliver to your home or office FREE of charge on the 2nd Friday of the month.  Our next delivery dates are January 13 and February 10. Order coffee occasionally or every month, as you wish. Sign up for a monthly subscription and one 12 oz bag is FREE.

3) Monthly Mail Orders -- Even if you don't live in our free delivery area, save 10% by signing up for a monthly mailed subscription.

4) Retail Outlets -- Stop by one of our few retail partners. 

2016 Holiday Flavors

And the winners are...

Bonfire: Sweet, creamy icing swirled in spicy cinnamon and fresh bread...an amazing aroma wafting from your cup...very reminiscent of grandma's Hot Fresh Buns...perfect for chilly nights (and mornings) to warm you up!

Chocolate Hazelnut Cream: Rich Honduran beans combined with sharp dark chocolate and rich nutty taste of gourmet hazelnut. This special brew is a perfect holiday treat.

Confused Santa: Is it March? Is it December? We asked Santa for his favorite coffee flavor when he comes down the chimney...and my, Santa is confused! He wanted a delicious Irish Cream coffee, with an extra (large) splash of rum and a dash(er) of hazelnut...topped with whipped cream and nutmeg. What Santa wants, Santa gets.

Drunken Uncle: Yes, we have one too….and it’s delicious! Picture yourself around the fireplace basking in the soothing tastes of Kahlua and Irish Cream laced with Gran Marnier.

English Toffee: A tad of caramel, a touch of chocolate, a spot of cream, very British, very buttery, very good.

All five of these flavors will be available in the coming 2-3 months in 8 oz packages, whole bean and ground and in limited quantities of decaf for $7.50. (Our regular flavors continue to be available during this time as well.) 

Coffee News

Scenes from the Coffee Harvest and Holiday Opportunities in our December Newsletter. Previous issues of our newsletter can be found in our newsletter archive. For more news check out our VFC Facebook page (and while you are there "like" us too!)

Take a Virtual Tour of the Coffee Farm

This summer we received the most amazing gift!! Ashwin Atre (aatre55@gmail.com) and Olivia Sparkuhl just spent some time on the coffee farm in Rio Negro with Avilio and Bertilia (they are driving from California to South America!). They created this AMAZING video for us. So incredibly beautiful. So thrilled to be able to share it.

You can also learn more about how we grow and process our coffee through our photo slide show or download a copy of our new flyer.

Coffee Newsletter

Sign up for our NEWSLETTER to learn about coffee specials, new flavors, sustainable farming practices and for the latest Velasquez Family Coffee news. Subscribe in the bar on the left or contact us via our web form and simply tell us you'd like to start getting our monthly newsletter. See past issues in our newsletter archive. Read our privacy statement.
